AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Level_Description: AI is not used in the organization. Data is fragmented, mostly unstructured, and not prepared for analytical or AI use. Decisions are based on experience rather than data.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Assessment_Guidance: Verify absence of AI tools and assess data availability and digital readiness.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Typical_Evidence: Spreadsheets, emails, manual reports, no AI tools.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.AI_Recommendation_Logic: Block AI recommendations. Focus on data digitalization and foundations.

AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Level_Description: The organization experiments with AI tools on an ad-hoc basis. Data exists but lacks governance, quality standards, and ownership.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Assessment_Guidance: Identify isolated AI experiments and assess data quality and ownership.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Typical_Evidence: Single AI tools, pilots, shadow IT solutions.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.AI_Recommendation_Logic: Allow supervised AI pilots only. Recommend data governance.

AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Level_Description: AI is used in selected business processes with defined goals. Data pipelines and basic governance are in place.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Assessment_Guidance: Confirm repeatability of AI use cases and responsible roles.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Typical_Evidence: Documented AI use cases, dashboards, defined data owners.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.AI_Recommendation_Logic: Recommend scaling AI use cases and formal governance.

AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Level_Description: AI supports decision-making across multiple areas. Human-in-the-loop mechanisms and performance monitoring are implemented.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Assessment_Guidance: Check AI integration into workflows and monitoring.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Typical_Evidence: AI-assisted workflows, monitoring dashboards, feedback loops.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.AI_Recommendation_Logic: Allow semi-autonomous AI agents with escalation paths.

AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Level_Description: AI is a core organizational capability. Autonomous AI agents operate under governance frameworks, continuously optimized and audited.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.Assessment_Guidance: Confirm enterprise AI strategy and audit mechanisms.
AI_MATURITY_MATRIX.AI_Recommendation_Logic: Enable autonomous AI orchestration and innovation.
